nodes.text: Jennifer Heddle is an Executive Editor at LucasBooks, a division of Lucas Licensing. She is in charge of the company's fiction publishing program, working with licensees like Random House and Dark Horse Comics, as well as authors and illustrators, to produce Star Wars novels, reference books, comics, and other literature.
Heddle, whose hiring was announced on October 26, 2011, replaced longtime LucasBooks Executive Editor Sue Rostoni. She previously worked at Simon & Schuster in their Pocket Books division.

In addition to her editing duties, Heddle has written a short story for Star Wars Insider called "Constant Spirit" that ties into the novel Razor's Edge. Heddle also authored the World of Reading title A Leader Named Leia.
